title: Woman Sentenced To Federal Prison For O’Fallon Bank Robbery (United States Attorney's Office for the ...
text: ( Source : United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Illinois ) Denise K. Dodson, 45, of Troy, Illinois , was sentenced in the U.S. District Court to 70 months in prison for Conspiracy to Commit Bank Robbery and Bank Robbery
